events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following the information received regarding the collision.
An agent specializing in motor vehicle claims has been assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant.
The claimant has acknowledged receipt of claim confirmation and appreciates the prompt attention from our team.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and the other party’s insurance details to proceed further.
The claimant promptly submitted all requested documents including photographs of the accident and the accident report.
Investigation into the collision details and liability is underway, with the assigned adjuster reviewing all submitted evidence.
The investigation concluded confirming that the claimant's vehicle was damaged due to the collision without fault on their part.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the full cost of vehicle repairs and associated expenses.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the efficient handling of their claim.
The claim has been approved following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the claimant’s bank account covering all repair costs.
The claim has been formally closed, with confirmation sent to the claimant appreciating their cooperation.
All claim files and documents have been archived securely for future reference in accordance with company policy.
